name: SYNC-ret Service
description:
Created for Weekly Game Jam #136: 'Single Player Co-op'

Use the power of teamwork all by yourself to protect the VIPs.

Figure out the right positioning and timing to move your agents in a race against the clock!

Controls:

W/A/S/D/SpaceMove Selected Player (While recording)
EGrab/Drop (While recording)
QThrow (While recording)
TabCycle selected player (While NOT recording)
1/2/3/4/5Shortcuts for playback controls
